channel.title: HD4890, should I buy it?
channel.description:
Well it's my birthday in one week and I have decided to get a new Graphics Card to replace my ATI 2400HD which I have at the moment. I want a card which can play games like Modern Warfare 2 and Red Alert 3 without any stuttering or lag. I found the HD4890, it seemed pretty good, but will it be enough to play these demanding games? Also, are my Processor and RAM good enough? I have a Intel Quad-Core Q6600 and also 4GB of RAM.
So, what do you think?
